paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: IHC using NI301A and Congo red staining on frozen salivary gland biopsies collected from ATTRv cardiomyopathy patients carrying the variants TTR-T49I, T60A, I68L, S77T, and V122I.
IHC using NI301A and Congo red staining on frozen salivary gland biopsies collected from ATTRv cardiomyopathy patients carrying the variants TTR-T49I, T60A, I68L, S77T, and V122I.

functional_data.summary: NI301A binds with high affinity to TTR variants, including TTR-V30M and TTR-V122I, indicating its potential for therapeutic applications.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families carrying the TTR variants.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the importance of TTR variants in ATTR pathology.
key_quotes: IHC using NI301A and Congo red staining on frozen salivary gland biopsies collected from ATTRv cardiomyopathy patients carrying the variants TTR-T49I, T60A, I68L, S77T, and V122I.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
